alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Norfolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wayland, or near Wellesley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Arlington, Natick, Watertown, Lexington, Wellesley, Belmont, Burlington, Concord, Sudbury, Bedford, Wayland, Weston and Lincoln. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Western Norfolk
